entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. High minus 8. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
